name: Fruit Freeflow Puzzle - 700+ Free Addictive Levels
name_original: Fruit Freeflow Puzzle - 700+ Free Addictive Levels
description:
Fruit Freeflow is a simple addictive puzzle game for kids and adults.

All you have to do is to match all fruits of the same colour together.
There are hundreds of levels as well as nearly a dozen of level packs available.
Enjoy this amazing game!

Disclaimer: In-App Purchases are currently not working. Sorry for that. Currently working it out.
